content:
Former head of one of the state -owned enterprises, the Ministry of Defense and his accomplice from a private entrepreneur demanded a bribe in the amount of $ 600 thousand.

About thisreportedNational Police of Ukraine.

For this amount, a private entrepreneur had the right to build a residential complex on the land of the Ministry of Defense.

The attackers were detained during the receipt of part of the amount in cash, withdrawn documents confirming illegal agreements.

The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, commenting on this information,stressedAt zero "tolerance for corruption and stated that it provides full support for the National Police to bring the perpetrators to justice.

The issue of notifying the director of a private enterprise and the expert of one of the state -owned enterprises about suspicion under Part 2 of Art. 28 h. 4 Art. 368 (acceptance of a proposal, promise or receipt of undue benefit by an official), Part 2 of Art. 28 h. 3 Art. 369-2 (abuse) of the Criminal Code of Ukraine.

Measures to expose were carried out with the participation of employees of the Department of Internal Security of the Ministry of Defense.
